channel.title: London Evening Standard | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/eveningstandard

item.title: The property in Dagenham was u
item.description: The property in Dagenham was undergoing ‘remedial’ work to remove and replace ‘non-compliant cladding’.

item.title: Two teenagers were spotted cli
item.description: Two teenagers were spotted clinging onto the back of the 85 bus travelling down Putney Hill

item.title: BREAKING; A man has been charg
item.description: BREAKING; A man has been charged with the attempted murder of a mother who was stabbed while with her child at the Notting Hill Carnival.
